lore: {"text":"The Minos Inquisitor is the rarest mob in the","color":"gray"}
{"text":"Mythological Ritual, and can only be found","color":"gray"}
{"text":"using a legendary Griffin Pet. It reduces","color":"gray"}
{"text":"your stats by 10% every time you hit it,","color":"gray"}
{"text":"maxing out at a 40% reduction. Similar to the","color":"gray"}
{"text":"Minos Champion, its stats increase by 6% for every","color":"gray"}
{"text":"second it is alive, capping at 600%, which is","color":"gray"}
{"text":"when it despawns. While alive, it summons","color":"gray"}
{"text":"lightning on the block you are standing on.","color":"gray"}
